"}, {"content": "The Hindu one.

Buddhists, on the other hand, worship only one god, Buddha, and they focus on personal enlightenment and spiritual growth. 

In the context of the question, it is likely that the Buddhist person and the Hindu person grew up in households that practiced similar religious traditions.
